title: bcd-watch rss feed
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD Changes Report, Wed Apr 03 2024

to Wed Apr 03 2024 04:41:10 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
